title: Orange Grove Apartments - Pet Friendly!
posting_body: ['Thank you for inquiring about our awesome community!', 'The rent price includes water, sewer and trash.', 'Our Floorplans are both convenient and affordable and offer all of your necessities!', '-Central A/C', '-Stackable Washer & Dryer Inside', '-Electric stove, Refrigerator, Dishwasher, Garbage Disposal', '-Hard Flooring in selected units', '-Ceiling Fans', '-Accent Walls', '-Private Patios on selected units', '-Rent Includes: Water, Sewer & Trash', '-Pool', '-Fitness Center', '-Playground', '-Covered Parking', '-Pet Friendly', 'Schedule a tour TODAY!', 'Remember to wear a mask upon touring', 'Monday-Friday 8:00am to 5:00pm', 'Saturday - 8:00am to 5:00pm', 'Sundays - CLOSED']
